entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening except northeast 40 gusting to 60 near mainland valleys and inlets overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h except northeast 40 gusting to 60 near mainland valleys and inlets early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023
